org.spongepowered.api.net

Interface PlayerConnection


  • public interface PlayerConnection
    Represents a connection of a client to the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getAddress()
      Gets the InetSocketAddress of this connection.
      int getPing()
      Gets the connection ping.
      Player getPlayer()
      Gets the associated Player for this connection.
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getVirtualHost()
      Gets the host name the connection is connecting to the server with.
      void sendCustomPayload(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.String channel, byte[] data)
      Sends a custom payload to the player connection.
      void sendCustomPayload(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.String channel, ChannelBuf dataStream)
      Sends a custom payload over the player connection backed by a ChannelBuf.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        Player getPlayer()
        Gets the associated Player for this connection.
        Returns:
        The associated player

      • getAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getAddress()
        Gets the InetSocketAddress of this connection.
        Returns:
        The address

      • getVirtualHost

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getVirtualHost()
        Gets the host name the connection is connecting to the server with.

        Examples include: If a player is connecting to `mc.example.com`, the hostname will show `mc.example.com`. This is NOT the originating hostname of the client.

        Returns:
        The host name

      • getPing

        int getPing()
        Gets the connection ping. This is constantly calculated by the server.
        Returns:
        The ping

      • sendCustomPayload

        void sendCustomPayload(java.lang.Object plugin,
                       java.lang.String channel,
                       ChannelBuf dataStream)
        Sends a custom payload over the player connection backed by a ChannelBuf.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The instance of the plugin
        channel - The channel to send to
        dataStream - The data

      • sendCustomPayload

        void sendCustomPayload(java.lang.Object plugin,
                       java.lang.String channel,
                       byte[] data)
        Sends a custom payload to the player connection.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The instance of the plugin
        channel - The channel to send to
        data - The data
